Description:
Detects the use of Moriya rootkit as described in the securelist's Operation TunnelSnake report

Author: Bhabesh Raj
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Moriya Rootkit - System
Query: sourcetype="windows-system" provider_name="Service Control Manager" eventid="7045" servicename="ZzNetSvc"
